title: Customizing the Django Admin
description:
How to build great admin user interfaces while still leveraging the
power of the Django's batteries-included admin.

Abstract

The Django admin interface is a great tool for rapidly viewing and
generating content, but its default one size fits all approach may not
be the best for the users of it.

This talk is broken into two parts. First, we will discuss user
experience and what users have come to expect from an admin tool. In the
second half, we'll show you how to bend Django's admin to meet those
expectations.
